blogPost.excerpt: Bored of budgeting apps? Try to gamify the experience! You can compete with yourself to save more than last month. Cash Coach will draw your objective line and get mad if you start to overspend! Succeed and your avatar will gain trophies 🏆 and experience 👑
blogPost.body: Bored of budgeting apps? Try to gamify the experience! You can compete with yourself to save more than last month. Cash Coach will draw your objective line and get mad if you start to overspend! Succeed and your avatar will gain trophies 🏆 and experience 👑
blogPost.title: Cash Coach - The personal finance app you’ll open everyday
blogPost.author: Seth Louey

localize.description: 厌倦了预算应用？尝试游戏化的体验吧! 你可以和自己竞争，比上个月节省更多。Cash Coach会给你划出目标线，如果你开始超支，就会生气! 成功后，你的头像将获得奖杯🏆和经验👑。
localize.tagline: 你每天都会打开的个人理财应用

localize.description: 厭倦了預算應用？嘗試遊戲化的體驗吧! 你可以和自己競爭，比上個月節省更多。Cash Coach會給你劃出目標線，如果你開始超支，就會生氣! 成功後，你的頭像將獲得獎盃🏆和經驗👑。
localize.tagline: 你每天都會打開的個人理財應用

previous.excerpt: Dual-pane file manager Commander One combines secure FTP client for Mac as well as cloud computing manager features and provides you with the built-in Mac Terminal emulator making it easy for you to manage all the system processes.
previous.title: Commander One 3.0 - Dual-pane file manager and FTP client for Mac

localize.description: 双窗格文件管理器Commander One结合了Mac的安全FTP客户端以及云计算管理器功能，并为您提供内置的Mac Terminal模拟器，使您可以轻松管理所有系统进程。
localize.tagline: Mac的双窗格文件管理器和FTP客户端

localize.description: 雙窗格文件管理器Commander One結合了Mac的安全FTP客戶端以及雲計算管理器功能，併爲您提供內置的Mac Terminal模擬器，使您可以輕鬆管理所有系統進程。
localize.tagline: Mac的雙窗格文件管理器和FTP客戶端

next.excerpt: Valora is a P2P payment app that allows you to send money like a text message to anyone worldwide. Powered by the Celo blockchain platform, Valora is the only wallet that enables trustless mobile transactions, with an easy-to-use UX, at near-zero fees.
next.title: Valora - Send money like a text message to anyone worldwide

localize.description: Valora是一款P2P支付应用，你可以像发短信一样给全球任何人发钱。在Celo区块链平台的支持下，Valora是唯一一个能够实现无信任的移动交易的钱包，具有易于使用的UX，几乎零费用。
localize.tagline: 像短信一样向全球任何人发送资金

localize.description: Valora是一款P2P支付應用，你可以像發短信一樣給全球任何人發錢。在Celo區塊鏈平臺的支持下，Valora是唯一一個能夠實現無信任的移動交易的錢包，具有易於使用的UX，幾乎零費用。
localize.tagline: 像短信一樣向全球任何人發送資金
